decisions.name: Check_If_Stage_Is_Closed_Won
decisions.label: Check If Stage Is Closed Won

rules.name: If_Stage_Is_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 ) OR ((1 AND 2 ) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6))
rules.label: If Stage Is Closed Won

rules.name: If_Stage_is_Other_Than_Closed_Won
rules.label: If Stage is Other Than Closed Won

decisions.name: Decision_Update_Quotes_on_Closed_Won
decisions.label: Decision Update Quotes on Closed Won

rules.name: Approval_Required
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (NOT(6)) AND (7)
rules.label: Approval Required

rules.name: Yes_Submit_for_approval
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12 AND 13 AND 14 AND 15 AND 16 AND 17 AND 18 AND (19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23)
rules.label: Yes - Submit for approval

rules.label: Yes - Contact is already added but not set as primary

decisions.description: This node was changed to pass thru as the booking amount calculation requirements continue to change. The Subscription USD Price flow will execute and update the fields that were previously being updated.
decisions.name: Subscription_Attached
decisions.label: Subscription Attached

rules.name: Yes_Team_Lead_Owner_Change
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) AND 8
rules.label: Yes

decisions.description: Unlock the Opportunity if it is an Approval Process
decisions.name: Unlock_Required
decisions.label: Unlock Required?

Flow.description: 17MAY25 - ESS2091 Update 'Opportunity - After Save' Flow for Fixed Term Contract Automation 24APR25 - Reflected Decision Approval Node with Disqualification Approval Entry Criteria 03April25 - ESS1901 27 Mar25 - Removed Decision Enterprise_Service_Level_Alert as per ESS-1854 21 Mar25 - Updated the decision:Subscription_Attached to update the Subscription Amount fields on Oppty as per ESS-1847 20Mar25 - Populate PAM Manager 13Mar25 - Automate the update of the Fixed Term Contract field in Account if Opp Term Type is Standard and Stage is Closed Won 12MAR25 - Removed Stage_Changes_to_Closed_Lost Decision and Update_Contact_Role_Closed_Lost and Update_Contact_Role_if_Agency_Influenced Update 14JUL23 - (CCMB) - Added updates to decision criteria for split opps to update child splits if Gross Booking Amt or Current Sub Booking Amt are updated 13JUN23 - CC(PJ) - Add DGL updates 05Jun23 - CC(SDA) - disable node to directly populated the Current Subscription booking amount. Will be populated via the async record triggered flow; Add update to child split opps for updates to parent current sub book amt; Set Approval Required to False if promotion removed from Opp 31May23 - CC(SDA) - get related Subscription current Booking Amount from Total MRR if BAPI 8May23 - CC Update Owner Manager Email 4May23 - CC Add Email notification for P+ deals 19Apr23 - CC Add Disqualification approval process 14Apr23 - CC Add Slack notification to P+ deals 12Apr23 - CC - Update Remove promotion if applied to Short Term 30Mar23 - CC - update the Account indicator values at the end 20Mar23 - CC - Update prior booking amount if it's an upgrade 09Mar23 - CC - Add update to Sales type if is an upgrade 04Mar23 - CC - update IsCloned to conditions to evaluate correctly 03Mar23 - CC - add updates to parent account for dedicated or premium plus indicator and update opp premium picklist field text based on indicator value 28Feb23 - CC - add trap to prevent notification to Opp OWner Manager is Opp Owner Manager is null 24FEB23 - CC - Update Dcn for Discount approval

formulas.name: fr_Opportunity_Type
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.Type}, "C5", "true", "C6", "true", "C7", "true", "C8", "true", "Premium 7", "true", "Premium 8", "true", "Premium 9", "true", "Premium 10", "true", "Premier", "true", "Premier Small", "true", "Premier Large", "true", "Premier XLarge", "true", "Atlas - Premium 1", "true", "Atlas - Premium 2", "true", "Atlas - Premium 3", "true", "Atlas - Premium 4", "true", "Atlas - Premium 5", "true", "Atlas - Premium 6", "true", "Atlas - Premium 7", "true", "Atlas - Premium 8", "true", "Atlas - Premium 9", "true", "Atlas - Premium 10", "true", "eComm P7", "true", "eComm P8", "true", "eComm P9", "true", "eComm P10", "true", "false")

formulas.description: Pull the PAM Manager Name value as Before Save Flows does not support some standard fields whose values are derived.
formulas.name: PAMManager

Flow.label: Opportunity - After Save

textTemplates.name: notificationBody

value.stringValue: "select SUM(split_percentage__c) from Opportunity where Split_Opportunity_Lookup__c = " +{$Record.Id} +" group by Split_Opportunity_Lookup__c"
